directions: In a bowl, mix the avocados, black beans, corn, onion, salsa, cilantro, and lemon juice. Season with chili powder, salt, and pepper.
ingredients: 1 (19 ounce) can black beans, drained and rinsed
1 (11 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
title: Val and Jess's Vegan Avocado Dip | Allrecipes
